name: X³: Terran Conflict 2.0 - The Aldrin Missions
name_original: X³: Terran Conflict 2.0 - The Aldrin Missions
description:
X³: Terran Conflict 2.0 - The Aldrin Missions is a simulation game developed by Egosoft. It came out on 07-04-2009. It was published by IGS Interactive.
You can play X³: Terran Conflict 2.0 - The Aldrin Missions on PC.
